English: It is impossible for me to help you.

French: Je ne suis pas si confiant.

English: I'll leave it up to you.
He will not do it anymore.
I want to get rid of it.
I want to get rid of him.
I want to get rid of her.
Today i am going to see him.
How do you know about that?

French: Le chiot de tom est ici.
